name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Gold Miners Inn-Grass Valley

reviews.text: Really enjoyed our two night stay at this hotel. Very new and fresh, all staff that we encountered were friendly and helpful, they acted like they were happy we were there. They have a nice cocktail reception every evening and a good breakfast each morning with hot cooked choices. A very good location in the California Gold Country to base day trips from. Would most definitely return to this hotel and recommend to others.
reviews.title: Great location
recommend this one
reviews.text: Very clean, excellent and friendly staff. Extremely accommmodating.

reviews.title: Loved the Gold Miners Inn
reviews.text: Easy walk to all of the down town ..Safe, quiet .

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Very nice (but pricey) Holiday Inn Express

reviews.text: A great place for families, business groups, single people.
reviews.title: Just say NO

reviews.text: About a half hour after arriving at this hotel, the front desk called to notify me that my brand new vehicle had been damaged in their lot. I went outside and with the manager immediately determined that a fault in the parking lot had caused it to give way. The manager agreed that the hotel was responsible for the damage and even signed a document to that effect. Today it has been 90 days and despite many calls and letters, I am still waiting for the $1,141 that they owe me and that they promised they would pay me. The manager is always out when I call and he is ignoring my emails.
reviews.title: Management did not come through on their promise to pay for damage

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This week I contacted the franchise company hoping that they will follow up with the hotel. Life happens and I can understand that things will happen, but when someone makes a promise and then decides to not follow through, they are NOT doing the right thing.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: These hotels are independently owned, but it will be a very cold day anywhere before I stay in this brand again. My next step will be to get my lawyer involved and then the hotel will be paying not just the invoice from the dealership for the repairs, but my legal costs as well.
reviews.title: Beautiful and Comfortable

likes.liked: — The Hotel was very warm and inviting.

aka: Holiday Inn Express Hotel And Suites Gold Miners Inn-Grass Valley
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel In Grass Valley, CaliforniaOur hotel in Grass Valley, California offers premium amenities and the comfort of home for traveling families and business travelers alike.History seems to seep from the sidewalk cracks and through the windows in this Northern California town. Here, visitors can view the historic Empire Mine State Park or the North Power House and learn the facts behind the California gold rush. The Grass Valley community is dotted with local wineries that feature award-winning wines; and in the downtown area, near our choice Grass Valley hotel, tasting rooms abound. Our lodging in Grass Valley is also in close proximity to the Foothill Theatre Company, Scotts Flat Lake and many California Gold Country attractions.Our Grass Valley hotel is conveniently located near several Grass Valley companies such as Nvision, Serra Corporation and Litton Engineering Labs. We are proud to provide free high-speed, wireless Internet throughout our hotel in Grass Valley, CA. For business travelers, we have four meeting rooms on the hotel property, copy, mail and fax services, audio-visual equipment and a business center.During your Grass Valley vacation, you can unwind in the fitness center or enjoy our complimentary hot breakfast bar and on-site deli. We hope you call and enjoy our excellent hotel rates in Grass Valley, CA.
